title: E Letter Spacing
content:
How's the letter spacing on this E? (I'm a newbie.)  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417164444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/E2_3608.png)
author: fahnestock

comments.content:
Try:

HHHEHHHEEEHHHEOOOEEEOOOEOOO + oooEoooEEEoooEnnnEEEnnnEnnn + as many words as you can come up with using only letters that are already spaced. Check out Nina Stössinger’s [Word-o-Mat](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417164444/https:/github.com/ninastoessinger/word-o-mat).
Man, I wish I had RoboFont, but I'll totally try that out. Thanks!

You don't need SuperRoboGlyphsPolator or any fancy tool for good spacing.

To me:  
- The "H" is a hair loose.  
- The "I" is a bit tight.  
- The "E" is a bit loose on the right, and probably a hair loose on the left.

hhp
